site_name: Land Comprising Part Of Existing Clarefield Open Space (East), Land Known As The 'Old Medical Centre', Part Of The Existing Claremont Way (East), Public Realm Located In Front Of 1 - 15 Claremont Way
description: Request for a Screening Opinion for the erection of a building to accommodate a visitor centre (Class B1) and a flexible commercial space (Class A3/B1) within the existing Claremont Way Open Space, with associated earthworks, servicing, cycle parking and landscaping, plus the demolition of existing outbuildings, re-grading works to part of Claremont Way, re-configuration of the highway and car parking spaces, installation of associated underground servicing and public realm works
